original_text:
“I have been the Lord your God
    ever since you came out of Egypt;
I will make you live in tents again,
    as in the days of your appointed festivals.
korean_text: 네가 애굽 땅에 있을 때부터 나는 네 하나님 여호와니라 내가 너로 다시 장막에 거주하게 하기를 명절날에 하던 것 같게 하리라

sentences.original_text: I have been the Lord your God
ever since you came out of Egypt
I will make you live in tents again
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 다시 장막에 살게 하리라

sentences.original_text: as in the days of your appointed festivals
